comment.body:
ok bruh how does mrna track you? how does it even touch your dna? standing out in the sun is *way* more likely to change your dna than a vaccine.

i want this virus gone from the face of the earth and vaccines are the way to do it. im tired of covid and the rest of us are too.

that looks like some kind of infection attacking the eye, not a vaccine accident of any kind. but do you happen to have any links to real reports of this happening? seen too much similar stuff that turned out to be made up.
i want one i havent reserved yet because i wanna see more about it and fps gaming but from what ive seen it already looks really good and its really likely im reserving one
